long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the brutal world of Mortal Kombat with this Live Wallpaper extension! Featuring high-quality animated visuals of iconic fighters and action-packed combat, this extension brings the fierce world of Mortal Kombat to your browser. Perfect for fans of the legendary fighting game franchise, it adds a touch of intensity and energy to every new tab you open.

Key Features:
Dynamic Mortal Kombat Wallpapers: Enjoy stunning animations of iconic characters like Scorpion, Sub-Zero, and more, bringing the game's intensity to life.
Clock & Date Display: Stay on schedule with a sleek clock and date interface, designed to fit the powerful Mortal Kombat theme.
Quick Access Links: Effortlessly navigate your favorite sites with customizable shortcuts for a smooth browsing experience.
Additional Options: Explore more extensions, review privacy policies, or uninstall with ease.

For Mortal Kombat fans, this extension channels the thrill and excitement of the game into your browsing experience.
